q:
Ben wants to work on Spark SQL CLI to run the Hive metastore service in local mode and execute queries from the command line. Assume that the configuration of Hive is done by placing his XML files hive-site.xml, core-site.xml, and hdfs-site.xml  in the conf/.  directory. Now, if he started the Spark SQL CLI to perform these actions in this scenario, then which of the following Distributed query engine directory commands must have been implemented to run the Spark SQL CLI in this scenario:

Directories

1.

./bin/spark-sql/start-thriftserver.sh

2.

./bin/spark-sql/beeline

3.

./bin/spark-sql
In Angular 2, which of the following commands is used to execute an Architect target with an optional custom builder configuration defined in your project?
You are working on the Angular workspace configuration. Which of the following properties customizes the ng generate sub-command option defaults for your project?

In MS SQL, you have created Red Hat Enterprise Linux virtual machines (VMs) in an availability set of your resource group. If you are required to enable High Availability features to your VM nodes, then which of the following Azure CLI commands is used to open the host files and set the resolution of the host name?

In MS SQL, you have created Red Hat Enterprise Linux virtual machines (VMs) in an availability set of your resource group. You are testing the connection between the created VMs. Which of the following Azure CLI commands in Azure Cloud Shell is used to connect a VM to another VM in this scenario?
In Angular 2, in which of these folders the CLI stores the Angular-specific code?
In Angular 2, which of the following files are generated on the execution of ng g component [name] command?
In Angular 2, which of the following commands is used to create a project?
Which of the following CLI commands is used to generate a component in Angular 4?

In MS SQL, if you are creating an Azure resource group by using the Azure command-line interface (Azure CLI), then which of the following statements about the Azure CLI commands are correct:

Statements
    1. The az subscription set command is used to set a subscription to a currently active subscription.
    2. The az group create command is used to create a resource group.
    3. The az SQL DB create command is used to create a database for the resource group.
In CLI, which of the following is the main property of the @NgModule annotation?

In Google Cloud Platform, you are scripting the gcloud CLI commands with the Cloud SDK data tool. Which of the following statements about implementing the Service Account Authorization technique are correct in this scenario:

  1. This technique is recommended if the user is deploying a script or automation methods across multiple machines in a production environment.
  2. This technique is recommended if the user is deploying a script or automation methods on a single machine.
  3. This technique is recommended if the user is running the gcloud CLI commands on a Google Compute Engine virtual machine instance where all the users have access to the root.

In MS SQL, you are integrating SQL Server with Linux. If you are required to create the Pacemaker cluster resource, then which of the following Bash commands is used to check whether all the Linux nodes are active?

In MS SQL, you are configuring the availability groups for SQL Server on Red Hat Enterprise Linux virtual machines in Azure. If you are required to use the East US 2 location and the name of the resource group as hackmyresource, then which of the following Azure CLI commands is used to create a resource group?

In MS SQL, you are creating an availability set for your resource group. If you are creating Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) virtual machines inside the availability set, then which of the following Azure CLI commands is used to retrieve all the list of the virtual machine images that offer RHEL with High Availability (HA)?
